name: stent
description: Stent is a state machines container made for UI development

scripts.build: npm run coverage && npm run test && babel src --out-dir lib
scripts.test:watch: ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --require babel-register --require babel-polyfill --require test/setup.js --require jsdom-global/register --reporter spec --slow 100 --watch --watch-extensions jx,jsx,json './test/spec/**/**.spec.{js,jsx}'
scripts.coverage: ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --require babel-register --require babel-polyfill --require test/setup.js --require jsdom-global/register --reporter xunit --reporter-options output=reports/test-results.xml './test/spec/**/**.spec.{js,jsx}'

author: Krasimir Tsonev
